Architect theme

Architect is a theme for GitHub Pages.

Versions:

  • llvm-7.0.0
  • mesa-18.2.4
  • glew-2.1.0
  • glu-9.0.0

Starting with llvm

With 6 gigs of ram or more

mkdir build
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$(pwd)/../../llvm_out_dynall -BUILD_SHARED_LIBS:TRUE ..
